content:
classDiagram
    "Phone Swap Request"
    "Request Phone" --|> "Available Phones" : phone_to_request
    "Swap" --> "Phone to Exchange" : phone_to_exchange
    "Reason for Request" --> "Optional Comments" : reason_for_request
    "Actions" --> "*" : submit_request, cancel
    "Backend" --> "API Endpoint (POST /api/phone-swaps)" : handle_form_submission
    "Database" --> "Swap Requests Table" : store_swap_requests
    "Requester's ID" --> "Swap Requests Table" : requester_id
    "Requested Phone" --> "Swap Requests Table" : requested_phone
    "Offered Phone" --> "Swap Requests Table" : offered_phone
    "Status (defaulting to 'Pending')" --> "Swap Requests Table" : status
    "Comment" --> "Swap Requests Table" : comment
    "Backend Validation" --> "User Making the Request is the Actual Owner of the Phone Being Offered in Exchange" : validate_user_ownership

metadata.meeting_notes:
Phone Swap Request Feature
Date: October 14, 2025
Attendees: Product Manager, UX Designer, Lead Frontend Developer, Lead Backend Developer
Objective: Define the requirements and implementation plan fo
